Title: Establishes the nail salon minimum standards council act
Summary: Establishes the nail salon minimum standards council act; establishes the nail salon minimum standards council which shall investigate wages and standards within the nail salon industry and submit recommendations on minimum wages, regulations and standards for nail salon workers.
LawCode: Add Art 19-E §§697 - 697-i, Lab L; amd §102, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the state administrative procedure act, in relation to enacting the nail salon minimum standards council act
